item.title: Part of the Club: Robinhood & AppLovin Soar on S&P 500 Inclusion
item.description: After a long wait, Robinhood and AppLovin are now set to join the S&P 500 Index. Shares spiked in response, with institutional buying ready to ensue.

item.title: Despite Pullback, Rocket Lab Still Looks Primed for a Breakout
item.description: Despite pulling back almost 12% from its recent 52-week high, RKLB remains in a bullish formation trading near the all-important $50 breakout level.

item.title: Analyst Upgrades Strengthen Microsoft’s Long-Term Outlook
item.description: Analyst upgrades highlight Microsoft’s long-term strength as cloud and AI growth offset valuation concerns and market volatility

item.title: Celsius Stock Surges After Blowout Earnings and Pepsi Deal
item.description: Celsius crushed Q2, landed a PepsiCo deal, and gained market share. Analysts see 25% upside. Is CELH the retail breakout stock of 2025?

item.title: Why Broadcom's Q3 Earnings Were a Huge Win for AVGO Bulls
item.description: Broadcom just released its Q3 earnings report, and bulls should love what they see. The firm made a milestone announcement that bodes very well for it...
